001
002
003import java.io.File;
004
005import javafx.application.Application;
006import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
007import javafx.scene.Parent;
008import javafx.scene.Scene;
009import javafx.stage.Stage;
010
011public class Main extends Application {
012
013    @Override
014    public void start(Stage primaryStage) throws Exception {
015
016        File fxml = new File("GUI/login_page.fxml");
017        Parent root = FXMLLoader.load(fxml.toURI().toURL());
018
019        primaryStage.setTitle("Bubble Tea POS System");
020        primaryStage.setScene(new Scene(root));
021        primaryStage.show();
022    }
023
024    public static void main(String[] args) {
025        launch(args);
026    }
027}
028
